lead_paragraph: BLOCK--Jeffrey L.,died January 12, 2016 in Westport, CT, beloved husband of Helen for 35 years. He was the proud father of Mike Meredith and Gabriel and the grandfather of three. He also leaves his much respected brother Elliot and soulful sister Diane. Jeff will be remembered for his disarming wit, keen intelligence and kind disposition. He was an avid basketball player often challenging and surprising far younger opponents. A skilled skier, he shared his love for adventure with friends and their grown children. He was a sensitive man who wrote stirring poetry for the delight of the select few with whom he shared this talent. After a long career at PriceWaterHouseCoopers. where he succeeded with creativity, grit and indomitable initiative, Jeff dedicated his time and energy to the grass roots organization Save Westport Now. Donations in Jeff's memory may be made to: www.specialolympics.org and www.nationalparks.org 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BLOCK, JEFFREY L.
